mapper.update:
update cst_linkman
lkm_cust_no = #{lkmCustNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
lkm_name = #{lkmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lkm_sex = #{lkmSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lkm_position = #{lkmPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lkm_tel = #{lkmTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lkm_mobile = #{lkmMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lkm_memo = #{lkmMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lkm_flag = #{lkmFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where lkm_id = #{lkmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update cst_linkman set lkm_cust_no = #{lkmCustNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, lkm_name = #{lkmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lkm_sex = #{lkmSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lkm_position = #{lkmPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lkm_tel = #{lkmTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lkm_mobile = #{lkmMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lkm_memo = #{lkmMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lkm_flag = #{lkmFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT} where lkm_id = #{lkmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
